ai-ja305:1.2_0: for someone who does bad deeds.
ai-ja305:1.3_0: Seeing those beings who see sentient beings
ai-ja305:2.1_0: in private, I don’t see it,
ai-ja305:2.3_0: wherever I do not see another,
ai-ja305:2.4_0: It is good to me, it is mine.”
ai-ja305:3.3_0: is always to be found, and when damaged.
ai-ja305:3.4_0: I have heard the teaching of the Dhamma,
ai-ja305:4.1_0: And how does a brahmin give up?
ai-ja305:4.3_0: is the one who considers Dhamma
ai-ja305:4.4_0: I realized the truths of self.”
ai-ja305:5.1_0: The fifth section for recitation on ethics is the fifth.
